channel.title: Friends List
channel.description:
I'm having a problem with the friends list on a P16 based server. You can add people to the list by right clicking in the text box, and it shows them as a green dot and reports them logging in. But, the friends list just says "Loading, please wait...". Any idea on how to fix this, because many servers have working friends lists. :D
And can't find tut on this, if you find one please post link :)

item.title: Friends List
item.dc:creator: @ry60003333 ry60003333
item.description:
@ry60003333 wrote:

I’m having a problem with the friends list on a P16 based server. You can add people to the list by right clicking in the text box, and it shows them as a green dot and reports them logging in. But, the friends list just says “Loading, please wait…”. Any idea on how to fix this, because many servers have working friends lists.

And can’t find tut on this, if you find one please post link
